entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Rockies. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 March 2023
